"Squashing Stigmas, Emphasizing Community"

By Brittany Provost


 Brittany Prevost

 EDM Journalist | Content Creator



        Hi, rave babes! I’m Brittany Provost. I’m an EDM Journalist who not only leaves my heart and soul on the dance floor, but also in my body of work. My mission with my projects is to eliminate the stigmas often associated with the rave scene, and emphasize the individuals within our community.
